sentences.en: A corrosive solution of sulfur trioxide in sulfuric acid.
sentences.cn: 稀释的硫酸,用于蓄电池.

sentences.en: Acids used in pickling can include sulfuric.
sentences.cn: 酸浸渍中用的酸有硫酸.

sentences.en: As a comparison, the pouring point of sulfuric acid and then nothing?
sentences.cn: 这样一比较起来, 泼点硫酸又算得了什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: Both concentrated sulphuric acid and dilute sulfuric acid are corrosive.
sentences.cn: 浓硫酸和稀硫酸都具有腐蚀性.

sentences.en: Certain colors, due to pigment ingredients, may inherently have very poor sulfuric acid resistance.
sentences.cn: 某些颜料, 由于色素组成成份的性质而导致耐酸性很差.

sentences.en: Chlorination is carried out with Nhaloamines and sulfuric acid.
sentences.cn: 氯化是用N- 卤胺和硫酸.

sentences.en: Most sulfuric acid is made by the contact process.
sentences.cn: 大多数的硫酸是用接触法制造的.

sentences.en: Must not add water, well water and concentrated sulfuric acid.
sentences.cn: 切忌加注河水 、 井水和浓硫酸.

sentences.en: Sulfonated EPDM ionomers ( S - EPDM ) were prepared with concentrated sulfuric acid and acetic anhydride.
sentences.cn: 用浓硫酸和醋酸酐与三元乙丙橡胶(EPDM ) 反应制备了磺化三元乙丙橡胶离聚物 ( S-EPDM).

sentences.en: Sulfur dioxide turns into tiny droplets of sulfuric acid. These light-colored droplets cool the Earth by reflecting sunlight back to space.
sentences.cn: 二氧化硫能转变为微小的硫酸雨滴，这些浅色的雨滴能通过反射太阳光返回太空来使地球降温。

sentences.en: Sulfur or sulfuric deliveries can be similarly measured.
sentences.cn: 硫黄和硫酸的交货量也可用类似方法测定.

sentences.en: Sulfuric acid leaching technology of a nickeliferous spent material was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了含镍废料的酸浸工艺.

sentences.en: The chemical method include treating with sulfuric acid, saponification, acylation, esterification, etc.
sentences.cn: 化学方法包括酸洗法 、 皂化法 、 酰化法和酯化法等.

sentences.en: The reaction of iron with sulfuric acid is a case of replacement.
sentences.cn: 铁和硫酸的反应是一种置换反应.

sentences.en: The sulfur dioxide combines with water in the air, forming sulfuric acid.
sentences.cn: 二氧化硫与水结合在空气中, 形成硫酸.

sentences.en: This variety is said to have a dog or panther-like nose and face, a forked tongue protruding from it, large fangs, and to hiss and screech when alarmed, as well as leave a sulfuric stench behind.
sentences.cn: 据说，它还拥有狗或是豹子一样的鼻子和脸，像叉子一样的舌头，很大的獠牙，被惊吓到时会嘶嘶作声并尖叫并放出含有大量硫磺的臭气。

sentences.en: Zinc gluconate is synthesized with calcium gluconate, sulfuric acid and zinc oxide.
sentences.cn: 阐述以葡萄糖酸钙 、 浓硫酸、氧化锌为主要原料合成葡萄糖酸锌的新方法.

words.tran_cn: 硫磺的；含多量硫磺的；含（六价）硫的
